description: Coach partners with the client to identify or reconfirm what the client wants to accomplish in this session.
demonstrationExamples: Asking 'What would you like to focus on in our session today?'
Confirming understanding with 'So if I'm hearing you correctly, you'd like to explore how to approach this difficult conversation with your colleague?'
Checking in mid-session with 'Are we still on track with what you wanted to accomplish today?'
